practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Wrongful Death|Trucking Accidents|Brain Injury|Birth Injury
description:
At the law offices of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys, we are committed to assisting people in Vancouver, Washington, through a wide range of financial issues, including bankruptcy, credit rebuilding and consumer protection. For over 15 years, clients throughout Oregon and the Tri-County area of Washington rely on our dedicated team of attorneys to stand by their side during an often hard and stressful time. Whether people are victims of creditor harassment, wage garnishment, bad credit or need to explore other financial options, we offer a free initial consultation where clients meet with our knowledgeable and experienced attorneys.

In addition to handling bankruptcy matters, our law offices help people who have been victimized by another's negligence in car or truck collisions. We understand that people may receive debilitating injuries such as traumatic brain damage, broken bones or other conditions that could affect their ability to work and maintain a good quality of life. From wrongful death to birth injuries, our attorneys have over 30 years of experience building solid cases for those who have suffered an injury as the result of another person's recklessness.

The legal team at the law offices of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys has handled thousands of cases involving Chapter 7, Chapter 13, Chapter 11 and Chapter 12 bankruptcies. Their dedication to clients has built a reputation for excellence. As a convenience to our clients, we accept credit cards as well as other forms of payment.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
